Behind the stars

Behind the stars are VisitDenmark , HORESTA , Hotelstars Union and representatives from the industry through the classification board. Hotelstars Union establishes its hotel criteria jointly between participating countries. The criteria are continuously revised to ensure that they reflect the needs of the guests and the industry's development.

The administration and inspections are handled by HORESTA. The administration participates in all board meetings without voting rights.
